I started seriously learning programming, starting with Python, when the COVID-19 quarantine started.
After learning Python for several months and getting comfortable with it, I started to branch out to some other languages and tools for web development. At this time I also started to learn some C#, which I have started to put to use with Unity, developing games.
Find the older version of this site here. Here are some simple projects:
Scheduling Website

A project using Django and Bootstrap. I learned about standard practices in web development, deployment of websites and server management.

Visit site

Weather Lookup

This project used PHP and Javascript. It is a page that takes the name of a city and looks up the weather for that city. It taught me how to use APIs with PHP.

Visit page

Zip Code Lookup

This project also used PHP and Javascript as well as Bootstrap. It takes an address and looks up the zipcode for the address using the Google Maps API.

Visit page
